description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage

level_1_features.name: Rage
level_1_features.description: Enter a battle rage as a bonus action (2/long rest at level 1). While raging, gain +2 damage, advantage on Strength checks and saves, and resistance to physical damage

level_1_features.name: Unarmored Defense
level_1_features.description: While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + Dexterity modifier + Constitution modifier
